=PROBLEMAS ENCONTRADOS PELOS AMIGOS E PROBLEMAS RESOLVIDOS=

Executa o jogo em modo administrador e seus problemas se resolveram! 
Quanto ao mapa,ele tÃƒÂ¡ bugado,nÃƒÂ£o aparece nada. 
Pra resolver o problema do mapa ÃƒÂ© sÃƒÂ³ ir na pasta data_win32 e excluir os arquivos patch.dat e patch.fat . 
Espero ter ajudado. xD

=RESOLVIDO=

Entrar na pasta Suporte/Software e instalar DirectX, GameLauncher[uplay], Net Framework4 e VCRedist.
O Mais importante ÃƒÂ© o uPlay sem ele vocÃƒÂª NÃƒÂ£o consegue SALVAR o game. Deve instalar e criar uma conta ONLINE.

Primeiro Problema encontrado no jogo: Ao descer a escada abrindo a porta o jogo fecha.

Resolvido com NOVO CRACK , apenas nÃƒÂ£o execute o jogo pelo atalho do DESKTOP.

=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=
1.Montar Iso image with UltraISO (Included in the package).
2.Instalar Setup.Exe. (Run as Administrator)
Copy contents of 3.Extrair NEW CRACK to the bin folder and replace.
4.Jogar and Fun!

= PROBLEMS FOUND BY FRIENDS AND PROBLEMS SOLVED =

Runs the game in administrator mode and your problems resolved!
As for the map, he's bugged, nothing appears.
To solve the problem of the map just go in and delete the folder data_win32 patch.dat files and patch.fat.
Hope this helps. xD

= SOLVED =

Sign the Support / Software folder and install DirectX, GameLauncher [Uplay] Net Framework4 and VCRedist.
Most important is the Uplay without it you can not SAVE the game. Must install and create an ONLINE account.

First problem found in the game: When descending the ladder opening the door closes the game.

NEW CRACK solved, just do not run the game through the shortcut DESKTOP.

Grateful: Zzagor (Kato)
